name: Bomb-Resolution
description:
[In testing]

“BOMB RESOLUTION” 

Be the weapon that destroys your enemy and win that  dispute that make you mad, with this funny Top-Down 2D Game for two players. Your goal is to destroy the enemy base with your life before the time runs. But this isn't easy, to do that you have to success a labyrinth with devices that open paths for you and close them for your enemy. Don't worry, you can extend your life time... within those paths are items that increase your time and decrease enemy's time. Dare to try and resolve conflicts with yours friends with "Pjs Names TBA" in Bomb Resolution.

Player 1: Arrows - move up, down, left and right
